revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Jagged Pass |image = [[File:Jagged Pass.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Jagged Pass. |tokens = 22,000 |location = North of Route 112, east of Lavaridge Town. }} '''Jagged Pass''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 460,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Eric || [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Baltoy.png|40px]] Baltoy |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Numel.png|40px]] Numel || [[File:Picnicker.png|40px]] Picnicker Diana || [[File:Shroomish.png|40px]] Shroomish, [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish, [[File:Swablu.png|40px]] Swablu |- | [[File:Picnicker.png|40px]] Picnicker Autumn || [[File:Shroomish.png|40px]] Shroomish |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Spoink.png|40px]] Spoink || [[File:Triathlete_(malecycling).png|40px]] Triathlete Julio || [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite |- | [[File:Camper.png|40px]] Camper Ethan || [[File:Zigzagoon.png|40px]] Zigzagoon, [[File:Taillow.png|40px]] Taillow |- |}
<!--T:5--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | colspan=2|<center>N/A || [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || <center> 700,000 |- |}

Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 4.01% || 5.21% || 10.11% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Dread Plate}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 2.02% |- | {{Bag2|Stone Plate}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 2.02% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:11--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 0.90% || 0.90% || 0.90% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Dread Plate}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | {{Bag2|Stone Plate}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |} </tab> </tabs>
